titleStmt.title: The life and death of the B. Virgin giving an account of the miracles ascrib'd to her by Romish writers : with the grounds of worship paid to her / by a lay hand.
titleStmt.author: Fleetwood, William, 1656-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing, NUC pre-1956 imprints to William Fleetwood.
